name: Cardboy PrototypeTutorial
description:
This is a tutorial level of a small game I'm working on ! I'm still working on it, but I'm not gonna be able to continue for the next few weeks that's why I'm here, sharing my work hoping you'll enjoy it !

I encourage you to read the text in the menu to understand a bit more about how the game plays.

Controls:

  • ZQSD to move
  • SPACE to Jump
  • E to interact
